subject: Got a Radio,
author: SnowfireL@aol.com

-------------------------------1241560956
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Now I got to figure it out, thing is if one puts a recorder in where the  
speaker headset would go, it turns off the exterior speaker, so I can't 
record  unless i get it rigged.  The only one out that I could find is this 
little  silver, Am/FM/shortwarve RS  20-125 is what it is, I want to buy one of  
those expensive "Frank's Boxes'" which one gets the best spirit reception?   
This is a mess, the RS 12-469's and RS-12-470's are not around any  more,  
bummer!
